content: Installation Steps 1. Update package index sudo apt update 2. Install dependencies sudo apt install apt-transport-https ca-certificates curl software-properties-common 3. Install Docker sudo apt update sudo apt install docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io 4. Verify installation sudo docker run hello-world
title: Install Docker on Ubuntu

Default prefix: Ctrl+b
Session Management tmux - Start new session tmux new -s name - Start new named session prefix + d - Detach from session Window Management prefix + c - Create new window prefix + n - Next window prefix + p - Previous window Pane Management prefix + % - Split pane vertically prefix + " - Split pane horizontally prefix + arrow - Navigate panes
title: Tmux Shortcuts

content: Navigation h j k l - Move cursor left/down/up/right w - Jump to start of next word b - Jump to start of previous word 0 - Jump to start of line $ - Jump to end of line gg - Jump to start of file G - Jump to end of file Editing i - Insert mode before cursor a - Insert mode after cursor dd - Delete line yy - Yank (copy) line p - Paste after cursor u - Undo Ctrl+r - Redo File Operations :w - Save file :q - Quit :wq - Save and quit :q! - Quit without saving
title: Vim Shortcuts
